story.text: Well. I feel calmer. I have sobbed. I have screamed. I have contemplated my own death. I have contemplated the depravity of man and the unrequited love of some animals - usually not humans. But - I march on with Nigel's memory in my every waking moment. Not something we get through but carry on.
